title: Wildlife Photography for Beginners with Vanessa Joy
description: If you’ve ever dreamed about photographing wildlife but weren’t quite sure where to start, you’re in luck—Vanessa Joy has a brand-new class that was made for you. She’s breaking down all the basics in a way that’s super-approachable and totally beginner-friendly. From camera settings and gear tips to prepping for your first photo safari, she’s sharing what you need to know before you go, so you can stay in the moment and enjoy the magic when it happens. It’s fun, it’s informative, and if wildlife photography has been on your bucket list, this class is a great first step. Watch the video below to hear Vanessa tell you what it’s all about! Then head over and watch the full class here. The post Wildlife Photography for Beginners with Vanessa Joy appeared first on Lightroom Killer Tips.
author: Kim Doty
excerpt: Get started with wildlife photography the fun and easy way! Vanessa Joy shares beginner-friendly tips, gear advice, and everything you need to know before your first photo safari.
